name: robo-hour
description:
ERROR ERROR: the program is having some issues due to a giant robot. 

the robot ate the menus and it made some things go bad if your HP recaches to 0. try to avoid that.

gameplay: you are a robot, you have a giant laser, you have a destroy-able city.  you know what to do.

controls: just swing your mouse all over the screen. the laser will aim towards it.
